section.name: First Steps with Maven-2
section.p: Minimal configuration is required to get started with your Jetspeed custom build and Maven-2.

subsection.name: Copying in the settings.xml
subsection.p: The first step to building with Maven-2 is to setup your settings.xml. These settings hold all the information necessary to build with Maven-2 and Jetspeed plugin.

You need to edit settings.xml This file is in Maven home directory is located in a directory named .m2 found under your User Home directory. So for example that would be ~/.m2/ on Linux, or "%USERPROFILE%\.m2\" on Windows.

subsection.name: Editing the settings.xml
subsection.p:
Add the following section in your settings.xml
<pluginGroups> <pluginGroup>org.apache.portals.jetspeed-2</pluginGroup> </pluginGroups>
